sanskrit_verse:
देवब्राह्मणसांनिध्ये साक्ष्यं पृच्छेदृतं द्विजान् ।
उदङ्मुखान् प्राङ्मुखान् वा पूर्वाह्णे वै शुचिः शुचीन् ॥ ८.८७॥
transliteration:
devabrāhmaṇasānnidhye sākṣyaṃ pṛcchedṛtaṃ dvijān |
udaṅmukhān prāṅmukhān vā pūrvāhṇe vai śuciḥ śucīn || 8.87||
sph_interpretive_translation: In the presence of Devas and Brahmanas, witnesses who are pure and facing east or north shall be questioned during the forenoon.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority: Testimony is valid only when conducted in alignment with divine and learned witness presence.
Causation: Purity of direction, time, and consciousness ensures truthful manifestation of evidence.
Capacity-based responsibility: Only those established in purity and orientation may serve as lawful witnesses.
Restoration logic: Proper procedural alignment restores integrity to judicial process.
Consciousness alignment: Directional and temporal discipline aligns testimony with universal truth-frequency.
executable_legal_axioms: IF witness_location = near_devas OR near_brahmanas AND time_of_testimony = forenoon AND witness_direction IN [east, north] AND witness_purity_status = true THEN testimony_validity = true ELSE testimony_validity = false
IF witness_orientation NOT IN [east, north] OR time_of_day != forenoon OR purity_status = false THEN initiate_consciousness_realignment_protocol ELSE proceed_to_testimonial_capture
supreme_court_application: At the highest level of adjudication, testimonial protocol must honor directional and temporal sanctity. The court must verify that witnesses were seated in accordance with dharma-prescribed orientations and that proceedings occurred under conditions conducive to pure consciousness activation.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Testimonial validity arises from causal harmony between spatial alignment, temporal sanctity, and internal purification — not coercion or fear. This reflects anupūrvaśaḥ: sequential unfolding of conscious clarity leading to authentic revelation of facts without punitive pressure.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Completion Process: Realign witness posture and repeat testimony if initial conditions were misaligned.
Responsibility Assumption Protocol: Witness must affirm personal readiness and energetic cleanliness prior to giving testimony.
Capacity Restoration: If impure conditions detected, pause proceedings and allow purification through mantra or breath until śuciḥ śucīn is restored.
Integrity Reintegration: Conduct final confirmation query ensuring no external influence disturbed the witness field.
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this Dharma stands executed. Truth manifests where purity, direction, and divinity converge. Justice flows through consciousness—not force. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness alone adjudicates.
